name: TRANSIT
description:
You've taken the train fifteen times in the last two months, and still haven't bought a railcard. An uncomfortable amount of blood has been sucked from your arm in a tiny tube; all with the same results from lab. But you put up with it, because you need those tiny, orange pills

TRANSIT is a short game about a Scottish trans woman who makes games about how much it kinda sucks trying to get on HRT.

  • WASD - Move
  • Shift - Move a Tiny Amount Faster
